h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: There are more than a few plants to gather that are scattered around the upper plains here, including Licorice. If you move straight ahead, you can find the Sandgate Bound Shrine by some rocks before the large cliff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Sandgate Bound'.
The content is as follows:
There are more than a few plants to gather that are scattered around the upper plains here, including Licorice. If you move straight ahead, you can find the Sandgate Bound Shrine by some rocks before the large cliff.
